subject: RE: [junit] How Junit will test all assert methods, even if one or more assert methods fails in a TestCase?
msgSnippet: It is now on my to-do list.
messageBody:
It is now on my to-do list.

>>Here's a thought then. If J.B. will write the "don't" case,
>then I'll consider writing the "do" case. I can't start until

>>

>
>Thanks!

>Mike
